text:
<!everyone> happy friday folks!
---
we have some really cool roles up right now! if you're thinking of applying, make sure you <https://superpath.co/blog/2021-content-marketing-salary-report|check out our most recent salary report>. i've heard from a number of folks that it helped in the interview + negotiation process. rock on :the_horns:
---
*## featured roles:*
*---*
• KNIME AG is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/147494-b2b-content-marketing-writer-austin-knime-ag|B2B Content Marketing Writer> (:wave: <@UKQLFSX7H>)
• Animalz is hiring a Content Marketing Editor (new!), <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/139176-senior-content-recruiter-animalz|Senior Recruiter>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19184-technical-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Technical Content Marketing Manager>
• Ascend is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/141859-content-director-ascend|Content Director>
• Stone Press is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/139302-product-researcher-stone-press|Product Researcher>
• Pitch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/137381-senior-content-manager-editorial-pitch|Senior Content Manager, Editorial>
• Panther is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/122917-director-of-content-marketing-panther|Director of Content Marketing> (up to $140k) and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/122912-senior-content-marketer-panther|Senior Content Marketer> (up to $80k) 
• Shopify is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/105224-writercontent-marketing-manager-remote-shopify|Writer/Content Marketing Manager (remote>) (<@U02594B86Q0>)
• ChartMogul is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/97371-senior-analyst-saas-data-journalist-chartmogul|Senior Analyst (SaaS Data Journalist>)
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90483-director-of-content-marketing-verblio|Director of Content Marketing> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/130606-customer-success-manager-verblio|Customer Success Manager>
• Ripple is hiring a <https://boards.greenhouse.io/ripple/jobs/3071610|Senior Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@U024MQMGV24>)
• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/28744-head-of-content-and-community-campfire-labs|Head of Content & Community>, a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29028-client-content-strategist-campfire-labs|Client Content Strategist> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29030-staff-writer-campfire-labs|Staff Writer> (<@U01JKS2FESH>)
---
*and more from the job board:*
---
• Staffbase is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/145749-head-of-content-staffbase|Head of Content> (:wave: <@UJ420S7MG>)
• Muck Rack is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/142576-senior-product-designer-muck-rack|Senior Product Designer>
• Pry is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/140155-thought-leadership-writer-pry|thought leadership writer (freelance)>
• i-Sight is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/139225-content-marketing-manager-i-sight|Content Marketing Manager>
• Toggl is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/135428-content-marketing-manager-toggl|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@UJG4WTGKS>)
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/134938-content-marketing-writer-remote-podia|Content Marketing Writer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UJWJLLD63>)
• Advance B2B is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/131732-saas-content-marketing-strategist-advance-b2b|SaaS Content Marketing Strategist>
• Crossbeam is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/131310-content-marketing-manager-crossbeam|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@UJE5LQ2JC>)
• Solv is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/113412-content-marketing-manager-b2b-solv|Content Marketing Manager (B2B>) _(now with a video Q&A_ :tv:_)_
• Shorthand is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/127786-vp-of-marketing-shorthand|VP of Marketing>
• Pendo is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/126811-editor-in-chief-pendo|Editor-in-Chief>
• RevenueCat is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/126805-content-marketing-manager-revenuecat|Content Marketing Manager> ($113k-127k range)
• Printful is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/121688-german-content-marketing-specialist-printful-custom-printing-sl|German Content Marketing Specialist>
• Stacker is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/114045-senior-account-manager-content-marketing-stacker|Senior Account Manager, Content Marketing> (:wave: <@U023UCTKZ5J>)
• Modus Create is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/105201-content-strategist|Content Strategist>
• Demostack is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90653-sales-enablement-author-wanted-demostack|sales enablement author>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90683-product-marketing-author-demostack|product marketing author> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90685-generalist-author-demostack|generalist author> (:wave: <@U016V6EHYMA>)
• Ramp is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/90143-content-marketing-manager-ramp|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@UQ079M31P> <@UQP2SP2BX>)
• Keeper Tax is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/84780-head-of-content-keeper-tax|Head of Content> ($100k to $140k plus a $15k/month budget)
• Tuff is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/82405-content-and-search-marketing-manager-tuff|Content and Search Marketing Manager>
• Maven is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/83011-content-lead-content-marketing-lead-maven|Content Marketing Lead>
